title: 求forge的14.23.5.1847
author: 10and3
txt_content: hmcl上的forge安装不了，总是显示某某某依赖无法下载，怎么搞的说。

replies.author: 碉堡憨憨_
replies.txt_content:
1.你可以把hmcl启动器的下载源改成mcbbs
2.你可以到forge网站自己手动安装https://files.minecraftforge.net/

replies.author: 10and3
replies.txt_content:
